Verses: 2 mudhirvayadhulla Purushargal Jaakkiradhaiyullavargalum, Nallozhukkamullavargalum, Thelindhabuththiyullavargalum, Visuvaasaththilum Anbilum Porumaiyilum Aarokkiyamullavargalumaayirukkumpadi Buththisollu.
3 mudhirvayadhulla Sthireegalum Appadiye Parisuththaththukketravidhamaai Nadakkiravargalum, Avadhoorupannaadhavargalum, Madhubaanaththukku Adimaippadaadhavargalumaayirukkavum,
4 dhevavasanam Dhooshikkappadaadhapadikku Baaliya Sthireegal Thangal Purusharidaththilum, Thangal Pillaigalidaththilum Anbullavargalum,

5 thelindhabuththiyullavargalum, Karpullavargalum, Veettil Thariththirukkiravargalum, Nallavargalum, Thangal Purusharukkuk Keezhppadigiravargalumaayirukkumpadi, Avargalukkup Padippikkaththakka Narkaariyangalai Bodhikkiravargalumaayirukkavum Mudhirvayadhulla Sthireegalukku Buththisollu.
6 appadiye, Baaliya Purusharum Thelindhabuththiyullavargalaayirukkavum Nee Buththisolli,
7 neeye Ellaavatrilum Unnai Narkiriyaigalukku Maadhiriyaagak Kaanbiththu,

8 edhiriyaanavan Ungalaikkuriththup Pollaangu Sollugiradharku Ondrumillaamal Vetkappadaththakkadhaaga, Ubadhesaththile Vigarpamillaadhavanum, Nallozhukkamullavanum Kutrampidikkappadaadha Aarokkiyamaana Vasanaththaip Pesugiravanumaayiruppaayaaga.
9 velaikkaarar Nammudaiya Ratchagaraagiya Dhevanudaiya Ubadhesaththai Ellaavatrilum Alangarikkaththakkadhaaga,
10 thangal Ejamaangalukku Keezhppadindhirundhu Edhirththuppesaamal, Ellaavatrilum Piriyam Undaaga Nadandhukollavum, Thirudaamalirundhu, Sagalavidhaththilum Nallunmaiyaik Kaanbikkavum Buththisollu.
11 enenil Ellaa Manusharukkum Ratchippai Alikkaththakka Dheva Kirubaiyaanadhu Pirasannamaagi,
12 naam Avabakthiyaiyum Lowgiga Ichchaigalaiyum Veruththu, Thelindhabuththiyum Needhiyum Dhevabakthiyum Ullavargalaai Ivvulagaththile Jeevanampanni,

13 naam Nambiyirukkira Aanandha Baakkiyaththukkum, Magaa Dhevanum Namadhu Ratchagarumaagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Magimaiyin Pirasannamaagudhalukkum Edhirpaarththukkondirukkumpadi Namakku Bodhikkiradhu.

14 avar Nammai Sagala Akkiramangalinindru Meettukkondu, Thamakkuriya Sondha Janangalaagavum, Narkiriyaigalai Seyya Bakthivairaakkiyamullavargalaagavum Nammai Suththigarikkumpadi, Namakkaagath Thammaiththaame Oppukkoduththaar.
15 ivaigalai Nee Pesi, Bodhiththu, Sagala Adhigaaraththodum Kadindhukol. Oruvanum Unnai Asattaipanna Idankodaadhiruppaayaaga.
